meanings.definition: Happening or existing at the same time
meanings.sent1: The two meetings were scheduled for simultaneously in different rooms.
meanings.sent2: The synchronized swimmers moved simultaneously in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The cats sat on the windowsill simultaneously, staring at the passing birds.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts ran simultaneously, leading to a shared understanding without words.
meanings.sent5: The cars honked simultaneously in the traffic jam, creating a cacophony of noise.
